reviewText: Brought back some good memories of my 3 treks in Nepal.
I teach S.S. and this was wonderful!  Thank you!

My trip was something to remember.  And the book was the best thing that anyone could have in preparation for the trip.
Amazon always are on time if you need one.  Thank you!
Well done but should have more coverage of EBC trek if that is how they advertize it.  Good coverage of other sites
Bought this before my own trip to Everest Base Camp. I thought it a great quick overview of Kathmandu and the trek. Don't expect a documentary.
This is a fantastic video for anyone contemplating visiting and/or trekking in Nepal.  Having been to Nepal 6 times, I can highly recommend this video to anyone interested in this great country.

This is a great video for planning your own trip to Nepal. It starts by showing you the sights around Katmandu. Then moves on to the trekking portion. The video also shows some other attractions in other parts of Nepal that are of interest. This has been a great video, giving me the confidence to go to Nepal without a guide.
Excellent and informative DVD for anyone going to the region it gives a good insight into a wonderful trip.
